price: Эҳтимол сиз улар мўмин бўлмаганлари учун ўзингизни ҳалок қилмоқчидирсиз?
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
